column5: Sales to this event will be restricted to residents of PA, OH, WV, MD, NY, NJ, DE, VA and the District of Columbia. (quoted from ticketmaster.ca, the CANADIAN site)  THAT IS TOTAL CRAP! They shouldnt be able to do this. What is the point of having them on the Canadian ticketmaster site, if you cannot buy tickets?!?!?  :wallbash:  :wallbash:  :wallbash:
Try Stubhub (spelling), for either the Wings or Pens.

That reminds me of when the Sky Dome first opened up in Toronto and anyone in the US couldn't buy a ticket for any games for several years. Now they market the Blue Jays here in the Buffalo area.  What goes around comes around
I talked to him last week about those....but they are for the games in Detroit. I want Game #4 in Pittsburgh.
Hey Stoty....keep your eye here....  http://pittsburgh.craigslist.org/tix/  Good luck.

Stoty, my buddy (I am his best man at his wedding) plays for the Thrashers. I will ask him to see if he can get his hands on some. He usually comes through but this is a little different of a situation. I will ask though.
I'm with fishnfriend ... go fishin and listen to it on the radio in yer tent, while you are re-tying up some baits... HH
I'll see what I can do for you Wings fan.   I may be at Game 4 and if anything else comes up, I'll let you know.   Long shot though.
Remember that Marty? I think I will take you up on that offer now, please!
Welcome to..    Go Pens Go!  Ha,HA,Hee!!  Take off eh,you Hoser!
